DOC.brief_summary: A study evaluate long-term safety GANFORT® ( bimatoprost 0.03 % plus timolol 0.5 % ) Chinese patient open-angle glaucoma ocular hypertension insufficiently responsive topical beta-blocker prostaglandin analogue .
